title: Skipper bags new orders worth Rs 588 crore in India, abroad
description: Skipper Ltd has bagged fresh orders worth Rs 588 crore in the domestic and international markets. While its T&D (transmission and distribution) business has bagged contracts worth Rs 468 crore in India, the company has received another Rs 120-crore T&D orders in the international markets, Skipper said in a statement.
